product_name: Scarpa Luna GTX Hiking Boots - Women's - 2013 Closeout
long_description: With a supportive, full-leather construction that's easy to break in, the women's waterproof Scarpa Luna GTX Hiking Boots are an ideal choice for day hikes and weekend backpacking trips. Robust nubuck leather uppers provide excellent durability, support, and natural flex; rubber randing helps protect toes and uppers against bumps and abrasion. GORE-TEX waterproof liners let feet breathe while protecting them from the elements, keeping them dry and comfortable. Nylon shanks add support for hiking on rocky trails. Area around ankles is designed to enable freedom of movement without comprimising support. Polyurethane midsoles provide ample cushioning for long days on the trail. Scarpa Luna GTX Hiking Boots feature Vibram(R) rubber outsoles to deliver excellent traction and durability. Closeout.
short_description: With a supportive, full-leather construction that's easy to break in, the women's waterproof Scarpa Luna GTX Hiking Boots are an ideal choice for day hikes and weekend backpacking trips.
